QuestData.Title: The Blackwood Pledge
QuestData.Description: It won't be immediate, but the elementals' anger will soon die down and my people will live to fight another day.$B$BI will go help you and Malfurion in any way that I can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Malfurion Stormrage at the Eye of the Vortex.
QuestData.RewardText: This is fortunate news, $n. The furbolg may seem little more than a savage race, but their ties to the land are ancient and their shamans are second to none.
